short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds instant previews to search engine results pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension was rewritten from scratch. 
Supported search engines:

* Google (google.com)
* Bing (bing.com)
* DuckDuckGo (duckduckgo.com)
* Yandex (ya.ru, yandex.ru)

------------------------------------------------------------------------
Instant Preview shows you a site without opening it in a tab

In search results move mouse to a link and you get an instant preview of the site
